name: Galactic Heart Personal Session Including Energy Reading
description:
From the comfort of your own home (anywhere in the world), create time for yourself and receive a session of Galactic Heart Healing.

This session will last for 30 minutes. All you need to do is be in your own quiet space, and I will do the rest. 

I fully believe if you are guided here, it is right for your soul for whatever reason that may be. I do not know what will be the outcome of your experience, but I know that it is for your highest good, ultimately. 

From the centre of my galactic heart, I initiate the cosmic rays, and through the vortex which I am, I flow the energy in through me and out through my galactic heart, into your soul energy.  As we do this we are connected to the crystalline grid that my heart creates which surrounds earth. Unity Consciousness and unconditional love templating is coming through at a DNA level into those who participate. This is part of transmuting old beliefs, and releasing what no longer serves. This is a re-integration with cellular self in liquid light and love. We may also call this soul growth, soul-aspect alignment and healing on all levels. Emotional, Mental, Energetical and Physical. In unconditional love.

During the healing session I will receive impressions and indications of where you are on your life path, what's going on for you now, and pass on any relevant information for your growth on earth now. This is in conjunction with you receiving the Galactic Heart Healing, which is activating and anchoring more of your Merkabah lightbody fields increasing your light quota in your physical body.

This is a place for your own self healing, which only you can be responsible for. 

If you'd like to hook up on Facebook and leave some feedback, join here: 
https://www.facebook.com/IndigoIntuitive

Once your order is placed, I will contact you and we can arrange the best time for your session :)

name: Tuesday 26th Nov - Galactic Heart at Purple Dove Studios 7.30pm - 9pm approx
description:
Join me at 7.30pm (until apprx 9pm) in Purple Dove Studio where I will facilitate Galactic Heart Healing for you in person. Together we will journey into the sacred space where your soul is in complete control, and we will enjoy our individual space in the energies. Bring a blanket/mat to lie on, and a blanket and pillow for comfort. A bottle of water is a good idea too. Places are limited and MUST BE PRE-BOOKED through me. You won't receive this energy work anywhere else, and if you are curious - come along and try. Recent Feedback for my energy work has been from varied and is a very personal experience for those who take part: I felt the most amazing sense of peace I could hear people speaking to me directly beside me I had a very visual experience I felt a great forgiveness take place I had the most profound healing experience I felt very positive afterwards The pain left my body I fell asleep during the session, but you said that doesn't matter. and when I awoke I felt so much better, and my feeling of illness had gone. Phenomenal. If you cannot pay online, and wish to pre-book your space please telephone me or text me with your name on 07805 596 331 and I will reserve a space for you on the night, where you can pay me then. The studio address is: Purple Dove Studio| Unit 54 | Wilson Place | East Kilbride |G74 4QD
View Larger Map

name: Intuitive Energy Soul Reading (via email)
description:
Using my natural gifts of intuition, I will connect with your energy and describe all that I see or feel for you now. 

I quite often hear from angels, guides or loved ones who are with you - and I will pass on all messages that they convey to me. 

It is important to note that at all times I work with the highest love light available and information pertinent for you at the time of your enquiry. 

If you have specific areas of enquiry then please hold these areas in your thoughts as you put your thoughts up to the universe, and I will ask to connect to that vibration for you. However, at all times I will pass on exactly what I receive for you, in the manner I feel is best. 

Purchase Requirements:

*I work remotely, which means you can be anywhere in the world, and you do not have to stop what you are doing to receive this reading.

*I endeavour to email your reading to you within 72 hours of transaction. If there are any time constraints, I will advise you.

*Please include your date of birth in the 'information' field of the paypal checkout. Also please provide me with any illness or disease which you are aware of that you are currently experiencing.

*By purchasing this reading you consent for me to connect directly with your soul energy and pass on all impressions of information that I receive for you.

*By purchasing this reading you understand that by law I must advise that all readings are provided for entertainment purposes only

*By Purchasing this reading, you understand that I WILL NOT provide you with any specific direction in your life, but I will pass on the impressions of what is there for you to know, for now. Any and all direction or decisions for your life, must come from you. 

*I work remotely using my heart centre, and at all times work directly with the higher realms, and directly connected with your soul and physical energy bodies. My information sometimes comes through as a conversation, and sometimes it is slightly more disjointed, but at all times, I pass on specifics, as much as I am able.

name: Reconnective Healing Remote Distance Session
description:
Reconnective Healing® works inside the DNA of the cells, and are a deep, high frequency healing, that helps you on the physical, the mental, as well as the emotional and spiritual level.


The scientific research found that Reconnective Healing causes a measurable effect on DNA. And not just plant and animal DNA — but also human DNA. Further the scientists were able to measure this phenomenon over and over again, not just once. They were also able to see that with this specific type of healing, the body goes into a state of super coherence, which science has never seen before. Findings were so impressive that scientists are rewriting the laws of physics and mathematics because of it. It has received so much respected attention that even the United Nations has taken notice.

With Reconnective healing®, you are brought into contact with a high frequency energy level, and your inner essence. This happens though an entirely new bandwidth of energy that goes beyond normally recognized types of healing techniques.

Healing is a return to balance. Every health challenge is a combination of the physical, mental, spiritual, emotional (and probably a few other classifications we don’t have words for). We simply classify it according to its predominate characteristic. Reconnective Healing® doesn’t specifically “treat” anything. If in its presence you allow yourself to come back into balance, as many people do, then you do. You just do.

“Everyone’s experience with Reconnective Healing is unique. Often healings are reported in an instant in just one session, and sometimes it takes a bit longer for a healing to unfold. If you’re lucky, your healing will come in the form you anticipated; if you’re really lucky, your healing will come in a form you haven’t even thought of, one that the universe has in mind specifically for you.” 
Eric Pearl www.thereconnection.com


To schedule a time to do a remote session with me - please contact me directly on indigointuitive@gmail.com before making your purchase.  Otherwise, if you purchase I will contact you with my availability.
